oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the hot working characteristics of 2014 Al-20 vol% Al2O3 metal matrix composite
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MURTY, SVSN
RAO, BN
KASHYAP, BP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: efficiency parameter
strain rate sensitivity parameter
instability condition
processing map
2014-20 vol% al2o3 particle reinforced composite
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple instability condition based on the Ziegler's continuum principles as applied to large plastic flow, is extended for delineating the regions of unstable metal flow during hot deformation of 2014 Al-20 vol% Al2O3 metal matrix composite. The optimum hot working conditions for this material are suggested. (c) 2004
